title: Woodcraftsman: Stephen Hogbin
creator_credit: Peter Drummond and Craft Association of Australia
brief_description: Canadian Stephen Hogbin, internationally acclaimed woodcraftsman, came to Australia for one year as craftsman in residence at the State College of Victoria, Melbourne. In Noojee State Forest, where the college camp is situated, Hogbin discovers the exciting possibilities of Australian timber. He communicates to students his enthusiasm for the use of wood in crafting.
